subject: Soccer
Stadiums and Arenas
Olympic Games (2012)
lead_paragraph: The English Premier League club West Ham will move into London’s Olympic Stadium, ending drawn-out negotiations over the future of the $783 million site, which hosted the opening and closing ceremonies.
snippet: The English Premier League club West Ham will move into London’s Olympic Stadium, ending drawn-out negotiations over the future of the $783 million site, which hosted the opening and closing ceremonies.
